member.name: T:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute
member.summary: [deprecated] Please use [IndexColumn] attribute with "using Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5;".

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the index name.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets a number that determines the column ordering for multi-column indexes. This will be -1 if no column order has been specified.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.IsUnique
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate whether to define a unique index.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.IsClustered
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate whether to define a cluster index.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.Includes
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of name of properties for inclusion into this index.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index that will be named by convention and has no column order, uniqueness specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index with the given name and has no column order, uniqueness specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.IndexAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index with the given name and column order, but with no uniqueness specified.
member.param: A number which will be used to determine column ordering for multi-column indexes.

member.name: T:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute
member.summary: [deprecated] Please use [PrimaryKey] attribute with "using Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5;".

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this primary key.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets a number that determines the column ordering for multi-column indexes. This will be -1 if no column order has been specified.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.IsClustered
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate whether to define a cluster index.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key that will be named by convention and has no column order specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key with the given name and has no column order specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key with the given name and column order.
member.param: A number which will be used to determine column ordering for multi-column primary keys.

member.name: T:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.IndexColumnAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is placed on a property to indicate that the database column to which the property is mapped has an index.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.IndexColumnAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index that will be named by convention and has no column order, uniqueness specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.IndexColumnAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index with the given name and has no column order, uniqueness specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.IndexColumnAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new IndexAttribute instance for an index with the given name and column order, but with no uniqueness specified.
member.param: A number which will be used to determine column ordering for multi-column indexes.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key that will be named by convention and has no column order specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key with the given name and has no column order specified.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema.V5.PrimaryKeyAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new PrimaryKeyAttribute instance for a primary key with the given name and column order.
member.param: A number which will be used to determine column ordering for multi-column primary keys.
